main event: An unidentified object was observed flying east then north-west, leaving a smoke trail approximately 10 feet long.
interesting points: The object was first observed at an altitude of 26,000 feet and was visible for about 20 seconds,The object exhibited fast speed, faster than jet aircraft,The observers noted a flash lasting approximately 15 seconds,Observers suspected the object to be a missile, one size smaller than an Honest John rocket,The object was on a high arcing trajectory and did not appear to be gliding.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with a smoke trail
witness description: Captain Legau was the sole witness mentioned
